title: Add bisect_ppx to opam dependencies
description: Update dune-project to add bisect_ppx as dev dependency and regenerate .opam file. See docs/plans/2026-01-20-coverage-report-design.md

title: Add PR comment workflow
description: Post coverage diff comment on pull requests using actions/github-script. See docs/plans/2026-01-20-coverage-report-design.md

title: Add instrumentation stanzas to dune files
description: Add (instrumentation (backend bisect_ppx)) to lib/dune, bin/dune, and test/dune. See docs/plans/2026-01-20-coverage-report-design.md

title: Add GitHub Pages publishing to CI
description: Configure peaceiris/actions-gh-pages to push _coverage/ to gh-pages branch on push to master. See docs/plans/2026-01-20-coverage-report-design.md

title: Add coverage badges to README
description: Insert line and branch coverage shields.io badges that link to GitHub Pages report. See docs/plans/2026-01-20-coverage-report-design.md

title: Rewrite the 'Exploring agentic ideas right now' blog post
description: Rewrite the post to emphasize that all the work was done through agents - I didn't write a single line of code. The key insight: the meta skill of the future will be how to guide and orchestrate agents, not principally how to write code.

title: Add badge JSON generation
description: Script in CI to parse bisect-ppx-report summary and write shields.io-compatible JSON files for line and branch coverage. See docs/plans/2026-01-20-coverage-report-design.md

title: Move all the multicast_*.ml files out of bin and into lib
Create coverage CI job
description: New job in .github/workflows/ci.yml that runs tests with instrumentation and generates HTML report. See docs/plans/2026-01-20-coverage-report-design.md
